review: At first the Fire Stick worked wonderfully however after some time the glitter has worn off. The device lags between screens and often all apps need to be force closed for everything to work "seamlessly". Using Netflix is the biggest issue, the screen constantly freezes and the audio continues until the video plays catch up at a sped up pace. If I could go back in time I would bite the bullet and buy a Roku or AppleTV. Maybe the FireTV works better but as far as the the Fire Stick goes I'd look elsewhere.
